examples: Namaskaram, meeru ela unnaru? (Hello, how are you?)
Mee sahaayaniki dhanyavaadalu (Thank you for your help)
Dhanyavaadalu, meera chala dayaga unnaru (Thank you, you are very kind)
Kshaminchandi, naaku teliyadu (Sorry, I don’t know)
Kshaminchandi, meeku ekkadiki veltunnaru? (Excuse me, where are you going?)
Avunu, nenu vastaanu (Yes, I will come)
Avunu, adi sarainadi (Yes, that is correct)
Kaadu, nenu raanu (No, I won’t come)
Kaadu, adi tappu (No, that is wrong)
Nenu annam tintunnanu (I am eating rice)
Naaku nidra vastondi (I am feeling sleepy)
Bassu ekkada undi? (Where is the bus?)
Bassu late ga undi (The bus is late)
Maa illu chinnadi (Our house is small)
Illu ekkada undi? (Where is the house?)
Meeru ekkadiki veltunnaru? (Where are you going?)
Adi oka manishi (That is a person)
Manishi ela untadu? (How is the person?)
Idi chota illu (This is a small house)
Adi pedda illu (That is a big house)
Ee roju chala busy (Today is very busy)
Ratri chala manchi undi (The night is very good)
Ratri nidra ravatam ledu (I can’t sleep at night)
Uppu ekkuva ayindi (There is too much salt)
Chaduvu chala important (Studying is very important)
Idi kotta illu (This is a new house)
Adi paatha pustakam (That is an old book)
Eppudu start chestamu? (When will we start?)
Ippudu vellali (I need to go now)
Illu ledu (The house does not exist)
Enduku ala chesaru? (Why did you do that?)
Eppatiki vellali? (Until when should I go?)
Eppudaina cheyyacha? (Can we do it anytime?)

Eppudaina cheyyacha? (Can we do it anytime?)

Enduku ala chesaru? (Why did you do that?)

Manasu anandamga undi (The heart is happy)
Naku bhayam vesthundi (I am feeling scared)
Naku santhosham ga undi (I am happy)
Naku dukham ga undi (I am sad)
Nirasha tho undi (He is in despair)
Snehitulu kalisi undali (Friends should stay together)
Snehitulu chala important (Friends are very important)
Prayatnam chala important (Effort is very important)
Vijayam kosam prayatnam cheyyali (Effort is needed for victory)
Vijayam maku vastundi (We will achieve victory)
Parajayam naku ledu (I don’t accept defeat)
Maro okati kavali (I need another one)
Ippatiki em jarigindi? (What happened until now?)
Ippatiki undi (It is there until now)
Appudu nenu ledu (I wasn’t there then)
Illu ledu (The house does not exist)
Enduku ala chesaru? (Why did you do that?)
Eppatiki vellali? (Until when should I go?)
Eppudaina cheyyacha? (Can we do it anytime?)
